title: Conversation circa 1991
body:
A - Bill Clinton is from Arkansas.
B - Yeah.
A - He likes to eat at McDonald's.
C - I heard Eternity has stuff in it that makes girls want to have sex with you.
A - Cool. My dad wears that. I'll have to pour some in the bath with me.
B - You know, girls are kinda cool. Babes.
A - I like Six from Blossom.
C - Oh yeah, she's a major babe.
B - Do you guys think Kimmy Gibbler is a babe?
A - The neighbor from Full House?
B - Yeah.

*silence*

A - No.
C - No.
B - Yeah. Me neither.
author: Dan

comments.author: nicole
comments.body:
KG: I'm not dumb. D-U-M.
DJ: Kimmie, there's a 'B'.
KG: Where? I hate bees!

comments.author: Stephanie
comments.body: Sigh.  This is where I remember how much younger than me you guys are...

comments.author: bjork24
comments.body: I don't remember that line, Steph?

comments.author: Fyse
comments.body: What on earth is all this about?

comments.author: Stephanie
comments.body: Dan..I was graduating from high school and starting college in 1991; Watching Blossom and Full House weren't high on my list of to-do-in-my-spare-time list.

comments.author: bjork24
comments.body:
Fyse: just American pop culture junk.

Steph: who are you kidding, Steph? We all know you were addicted to Full House... come on. Admit it. Everyone was!

comments.author: Newell
comments.body: I hate Full House with a passion. It's just so sappy and cute, it's sickening.

comments.author: bjork24
comments.body: Sappy and cute... in a good way.

comments.author: Stephanie
comments.body: Sorry, I was addicted to Silk Stalkings right about then...you know, something a bit more 'grown up'.

comments.author: Brandon
comments.body: I watched the reruns of Ful House frequently around age 7 or 8... but in these shows, the olsen twins were about 2...  when i turned 15, they suddenly popped up, my age, with boobs!  i was stunned!  ...somehow i had imagined them as 2 for many many years.  (boy, NYU sounds better every day)
